participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and expressive, Amina has a passion for life and enjoys sharing her culture through dance.
participant_1.background: i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a. now i live in the united states. i like to dance.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and practical, Jake enjoys the thrill of racing and the camaraderie of sports.
participant_2.background: i'm a construction worker. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. i have been working since i was sixteen years old. my favorite food is mexican food.

content.text: TO THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA... both:
